sobremi.sobremiparrafo1: I am a Systems Engineering student with an intermediate degree in Systems Analysis. Additionally, I am taking self-taught courses to become a Fullstack web developer.
sobremi.sobremiparrafo2: My passion for computing began in college, where I explored languages â€‹â€‹such as C, C#, and Python, as well as working with SQL Server on database projects. Additionally, I have experience in using technologies such as Node.js, Express, MongoDB and more...

proyecto.frase:
The MERN applications were uploaded to a free host at render.com. Please note that when accessing these applications, you may need to wait a few minutes for the MongoDB data to fully load.

Applications that are frontend only have been uploaded to the GitHub Pages host.
 
All web pages developed, including this web portfolio, are responsive.
proyecto.descripcionnotasya: Platform to manage online notes with user registration. It allows you to create, edit and delete notes quickly and safely.
proyecto.descripcionecommerce: Selling products using the Fake Store API. Includes a shopping cart.
proyecto.descripcionecommerceMern: Direct access as an administrator to manage products with the ability to add, delete and modify them. Includes a shopping cart.
proyecto.descripcionpeliculas: Platform specialized in viewing movie and series trailers.
proyecto.descripcioncoffe: Static website that shows the menu of a cafeteria.

contacto.contactoparrafo1: My inbox is always open for questions, projects, or if you just want to stop by and say hello. I will answer you as soon as possible!
